text:
x_input = x_input.reshape((1, n_input))
yhat = model.predict(x_input, verbose=0)
print(yhat)
Listing 7.76: Example of an MLP model for multi-step forecasting for a dependent series.
Running the example ﬁts the model and predicts the next two time steps of the output
sequence beyond the dataset. We would expect the next two steps to be [185, 205].
Note: Given the stochastic nature of the algorithm, your speciﬁc results may vary. Consider
running the example a few times.
